name: Budget Template Freebie
description: Try out Budget Tracking with NotionI made this super beginner-friendly budgeting template for anyone who is intimidated by all of the spreadsheet-based budgeting templates. If you're just getting started and want to keep track of your spending in an app that you already use for your day-to-day planning, you're in the right place!What's included? Income Tracker Expense Tracker Budget Planner Live Account Balances - update automatically as you add income & expenses! Special Features 1 Chart to
features: Income Tracker; Expense Tracker; Budget Planner; Live Account Balances - update automatically as you add income & expenses!; 1 Chart to show your overall Budget Breakdown; Buttons to easily add new entries; Toggles to hide unnecessary information; "Cleanup" section for easy auditing in case you missed a necessary field; "Purchase" (it's free!); Access the template via the URL
